name: How can I send a message only to one device in AirSend?

step.name: Preparations
step.text: Open AirSend app on your device

step.name: View selected devices
step.text: In Messages section, under 'Select recipient' tap the selection box and pick 'Selected devices'.

step.name: Select desired device or multiple devices
step.text: In the selection box you will be able to select one or many devices

step.name: Changing selection
step.text: If you already have selected devices before, but would like to change the selection, tap the devices icon that shows to the right of selection box when 'Selected devices' is picked
